attributes.action: Move the early May Bank Holiday to May 1st (Beltane) so that Pagans in the UK have a day on which to celebrate and practise their beliefs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Beltane (May 1st) is an ancient British festival, celebrating fertility and the coming of summer. 
Contrary to popular belief this is NOT a Christian country. There were other cultures in these islands long before Christ is supposed to have lived.
Celebrating Beltane will ensure that the Old Religion lives on and that young people are taught the pre-Christian history and to respect ALL beliefs. Please be aware. Pagans DO NOT worship the 'Devil'. Such a being has no place in our beliefs.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MayDayHoliday/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
